https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bAObtcMQazUL3TuZeC7OH6p7bsL.jpg An unforgettable journey into the hidden tradition of China's Buddhist hermit monks. An intimate insider's look at students and masters living in scattered retreats dotting China's Zhongnan Mountain range. Amongst White Clouds
